titleStmt.title: The spirituall vertigo, or, Turning sickensse of soul-unsettlednesse in matters of religious concernment the nature of it opened, the causes assigned, the danger discovered, and remedy prescribed ... / by John Brinsley.
titleStmt.author: Brinsley, John, fl. 1581-1624.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
